160120.content: Zašto h ima mjernu jedinicu km^3/s? U primjerima je km^2/s.

160168.content:
Evo python program za računanje pod a) i b). Meni je točno izbacio.

Samo promjenite r_vect i v_vect tako da postavite svoje vrijednosti. Ovaj pod c) ne računa jer se on rješava numerički (ubacite u Wolfram Alphu).

>![code]
import numpy as np
import math

# Upiši vektor položaja (r_vect) i vektor brzine (v_vect)
r_vect = np.array([9192.5, 2887.3, 140.5])
v_vect = np.array([1.81, 7.88, 0.44])
# Upiši proteklo vrijeme u MINUTAMA za izračun prave anomalije (pod c)
minutes_elapsed = 117.0
seconds_elapsed = minutes_elapsed * 60

# Gravitacijski parametar µ (u našem slučaju je to µ_earth = 398600)
mi = 398600

# 1. Radius vector magnitude (distance)
r = np.linalg.norm(r_vect)
# 2. Velocity vector magnitude (speed)
v = np.linalg.norm(v_vect)
# 3. Radial velocity
v_r = np.dot(r_vect, v_vect) / r
# 4. Specific angular momentum
h_vect = np.cross(r_vect, v_vect)
# 5. Specific angular momentum magnitude
h = np.linalg.norm(h_vect)
# 6. Inclination
i = math.acos(h_vect[2] / h)
# 7. Node line
N_vect = np.cross(np.array([0, 0, 1]), h_vect)
# 8. Node line magnitude
N = np.linalg.norm(N_vect)
# 9. Ascension of the ascending node (uppercase omega)
OMEGA = math.acos(N_vect[0] / N) if N_vect[1] >= 0.0 else 2*math.pi - math.acos(N_vect[0] / N)
# 10. Eccentricity
e_vect = (np.multiply(v*v - mi/r, r_vect) - np.multiply(r*v_r, v_vect)) / mi
# 11. Eccentricity magnitude
e = np.linalg.norm(e_vect)
# 12. Argument of perigee (lowercase omega)
omega = math.acos(np.dot(N_vect, e_vect) / (N*e)) if e_vect[2] >= 0.0 else 2*math.pi - math.acos(np.dot(N_vect, e_vect) / (N*e))
# 13. True anomaly
theta = math.acos(np.dot(e_vect, r_vect) / (e*r)) if v_r >= 0.0 else 2*math.pi - math.acos(np.dot(e_vect, r_vect) / (e*r))

print("h = {} kg*km^2/s".format(h))
print("e = {}".format(e))
print("Ω = {} rad = {} deg".format(OMEGA, 360*OMEGA / (2*math.pi)))
print("ω = {} rad = {} deg".format(omega, 360*omega / (2*math.pi)))
print("i = {} rad = {} deg".format(i, 360*i / (2*math.pi)))
print("θ = {} rad = {} deg".format(theta, 360*theta / (2*math.pi)))


# Perigee radius
r_perigee = (h*h) / (mi * (1 + e))
# Apogee radius
r_apogee = (h*h) / (mi * (1 - e))
# Semimajor axis
a = 0.5 * (r_perigee + r_apogee)
# Period
T = 2*math.pi * math.pow(a, 1.5) / math.sqrt(mi)

earth_radius = 6371.0
# Distance from satellite to earth surface
z_min = r_perigee - earth_radius
# Distance from satellite to earth center
r_max = r_apogee

print("z_min = {} km".format(z_min))
print("r_max = {} km".format(r_max))
[/code]
